name: Don't Punch Out
description:
This game is part of the first 7 day #ParodyGameJam by Xfininator

Team: Luso5, Neialex, Nixrad.

Simple stuff, you see two people about to dunk each other out, you go to calm the situation, it goes wrong, and now you are jugglin punches up and down to avoid any harm comming to anybody.


CONTROLS
W/S - Raise/Lower Left Arm.
Up/Down or I/K - Raise/Lower Right Arm.

SPECIAL THANKS:
Neialex - Music
Nixrad - Character sprites
